activity_differential: cat playing with twig on log

description: A white cat is lying and stretching on a log outdoors, occasionally interacting with a twig and shifting its gaze and posture.

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: Leaves are on top of branches, not the other way around; flipping subject and object corrects the spatial relationship.
relationship_filter_metadata.label: flipped

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: A cat can be on top of a branch, but a branch cannot realistically be on top of a cat; flipping subject and object corrects the spatial relationship.
relationship_filter_metadata.label: flipped

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: Leaves grow on top of twigs, so the leaf should be the subject on top of the twig as the object to match the predicate.
relationship_filter_metadata.label: flipped

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: A log cannot be spatially above a cat; it is more plausible that the cat is above the log, so flipping subject and object makes the relationship correct.

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: Physically, the cat is likely above the log rather than the log being above the cat; flipping subject and object makes the spatial relation correct.
